html: (1 Nephi 21:8)."Day of salvation." Virtually every time one makes a commitment to follow Christ, including accepting the saving covenants and ordinances of His gospel, it becomes a day of salvation. The Prophet Joseph Smith declared: "We believe that through the Atonement of Christ, all mankind may be saved, by obedience to the laws and ordinances of the Gospel." (A of F 1:3.)
